Actions.ActionName: Run only one instance of this macro at the time
Display copySelect IF recording has started (Action Trigger) or wipe copySelect directly from Alfred (after delay)
Display Action Mode if one is active, or clear if not
Grab Active Mode from SW Menu
Actions.Text:
tell application "System Events"	tell process "superwhisper"		set menuItemName to name of menu item 7 of menu "superwhisper" of menu bar item 1 of menu bar 2	end tell
	return menuItemNameend tell

Actions.ActionName: Clean up parentheses from active mode from SW Menu
Prepare content that will be displayed on menu bar
